website_summaries.verdict: If you like having a high level of shine in your hair style, this wax pomade is the right choice.
pros: Controls fly-away hair better than other products
Includes ingredients that help promote scalp health
Works equally well on beards and mustaches
Will hold the desired hair style for the majority of the day
Doesn’t use synthetic fragrances or colorants
Rinses completely clean when you’re done with it
cons: Has a high price per ounce of product

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: I switched to Jack Black's Wax Pomade after trying Clay Pomade. The Clay Pomade had a stronger hold but was extremely sticky and hard to apply. Wax Pomade is an awesome product especially due to the addition of tea tree and sage leaf oils which are good for your scalp. The hold is fairly strong but flexible. If you need to re-style, simply use water and run a comb through your hair and you'll be good as new. For comparison, I've used everything from American Crew, Paul Mitchell, Uppercut, Bumble & Bumble, and Kiehl's. Jack Black really blew away the competition with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Adam E. Fields

customer_reviews.title: You don't need much for great control. I found by working it until it's ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased well over $100 in other products trying to find something to replace a whipped wax I was using which was becoming more expensive and inconvenient to get. I can say that I've finally found it. It took a few days to determine the right amount to use. You don't need much for great control. I found by working it until it's warm in my hands resulted in the best results. Put it on and comb everything in place. Once it set a little, comb through again and you have a great style and control. Will be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: meksmk

customer_reviews.title: Almost as good as FX Molding Wax
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because FX Molding Wax is no longer being made. I needed something comparable. This gets high points for shine and leaving your hair feeling soft and natural. Slightly less points for holding power. Even though it is pretty expensive, you get an extra ounce compared to most waxes.

customer_reviews.title: A solid product

I find it adds a clean, slick, shine to my hair although pretty much no sculpting hold. Adding a small amount to dry hair gives it some weight which, for me, controls fly aways. I have found that a little goes a very long way. For what it does I have not found anything better - wish it was cheaper.

customer_reviews.title: Great product that you should try!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! This is a very good product. It just takes a little bit of product to hold and sculpt your hair. I was surprised how long it lasted. It is still in your hair the next day and driving around with the windows open in your car doesn't really effect it. But it isn't spiky and uncomfortable nor is it very noticeable. It gives your hair I nice subtle shine, nothing obvious. It isn't greasy and a little bit goes along way. It works well on beards also. Keeps those stray hairs in place and under control. I've tried a lot of hair products and this is one of the best. Try it!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great smell, good hold
customer_reviews.text: Compared with Jack Black's Body-Building Hair Gel with Grapefruit and Ginger--which I obtained at the same time--this product is the hands-down winner, providing a stronger hold that I can restyle throughout the day without being concerned about tendrils of my short, fine hair separating and dangling onto my forehead. While the pomade doesn't smell as good as the hair gel, it nevertheless has a similar, muted fragrance that improves over what other brand pomades have to offer in that department. Although my favorite hair-holding products are those in the Layrite line, they don't have any particularly captivating fragrances like this one does. I would definitely get this again.
customer_reviews.author: Fry Boy

customer_reviews.title: Light control
customer_reviews.text: This pomade has a light herbal fragrance. It applies easily to damp hair and imparts a light hold which is fine for shorter hair. The look is more wet than natural but it is blendable and leaves hair feeling soft but not greasy. It rinses out cleanly without leaving residue. While I don't think it is the best choice for thick or especially unruly hair, it is adequate for medium and fine hair. A little dab helps tame the brows but if your facial hair is especially thick or stubborn, it is not effective. If your goal is to add smoothness and polish, you will be satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Antigone Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Just a little is all it takes
customer_reviews.text: Wax pomade is different than any hair product I've tried and it requires a little trial and error to get it right if you haven't used it before. It's really hard to tell how much to apply, so go easy at first. My best results have been with damp hair right after a shower. I just rub my fingertips on the wax (don't dig in or try to scoop it out) and then through my hair. The result is a nice, flexible, natural looking hold. It doesn't really add any shine, nor does it take it away. It does have a nice smell, but you won't really notice it because it takes so little to hold you hair in place.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Burns

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This one does what it says on the tin. I applied the normal amount for my hair, and was treated to a natural shine that held in place fairly well without being "crunchy" or overly stiff. Personally I prefer just a little more hold, as my regular product is Baxter of California's clay pomade and that can hold your hair in strong winds. For its part, this Jack Black pomade was enough that my hair was mostly untouched by some driving with the windows down, so it's a pretty solid hold. Recommended. Good hold, doesn't look too greasy, and doesn't have any off smell.
customer_reviews.author: Providential

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pomade with just the right amount of shine
customer_reviews.text: While this seems a bit on the expensive side, it performs quite well; providing a nice shine but not too shiny, just right, with a medium to strong hold. They call it 'natural shine' which seems accurate. The wax in this makes your hair a bit shiny, although not super wet looking, just a bit more shine than without it. If you're looking for a more dry matte look, try theinstead. The scent is very mild, which I appreciate.

The product comes out easily, though it does stay sticky on your fingers after application. The scent is very subtle. Personally, I have thinning hair and this type of pomade is not very flattering on thin hair. I feel it would be better on thicker hair. If you have thinning hair, I highly recommend

This product will keep everything in place and left my husband's silver hair looking shiny with out being stiff and hard to the touch. It also worked on his mustache as well giving him a nicely groomed appearance. This is a nice but somewhat pricey product, but it does go a long way.

I have tried several of these Jack Black products with varying degrees of success and this one did the job. I have straight hair and like to change it regularly so I need a good holding product and this did it. Would give it a try!

customer_reviews.title: Love Jack Black products for the most part
customer_reviews.text: Love Jack Black products for the most part. I generally prefer thinner less thick products, but this pomade is pretty thick and I still enjoy it. Take a tiny amount get it warm in your hands and apply. Gives a nice texture and good hold without making your hair crusty or crunchy. Scent is how it should be, somewhat manly. Washes out quite easily as well which is nice.

customer_reviews.title: The fragrance is super light and not perfumey
customer_reviews.text: With the Jack Black wax pomade no one will know for sure if you used anything in your hair. It dries matte and leaves no clumpy residue to contend with. The fragrance is super light and not perfumey. Hold is firm but not too stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Professor H

customer_reviews.title: Great product for facial hair
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for my goatee as I am bald (by choice) on top. The product works very well with a great scent. A little product is all that is needed unless you like the wetter look. There is no greasy feel to the product at all and it works well out of the jar; rub into palms then distribute evenly through beard or goatee. The product also washes out very easily.

customer_reviews.title: whatever your beard looks like before will stay about the same
customer_reviews.text: Definitely keeps my beard on hold. Natural shine = not really shiny. Essentially, whatever your beard looks like before will stay about the same. I would recommend this product.

product_meta.title: Jack Black - Wax Pomade, 2.75 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
Jack Black Wax Pomade is an exceptional hair styling product that provides men with buildable hair control and a natural-shine finish. Jack Black’s Wax Pomade is a perfect product for polishing and controlling frizz and smoothing hair into place. Our wax pomade contains multiple ingredients that work together to provide antibacterial, anti-inflammatory, and antioxidant properties to hair. It is easy and safe to use, rinses clean, and keeps hair in place for extended periods.

Jack Black Wax Pomade includes high-quality ingredients that are free of synthetic fragrances, colorants, and parabens. This wax pomade contains natural oils, including tea tree leaf oil, which soothes and reduces irritation, sage leaf extract, which provides antibacterial and anti-inflammatory benefits, and grapefruit peel oil. Botanical extracts including basil, sea kelp, and green tea extract to supply superior hydration are also included.

Every Jack Black product features certified organic ingredients and is cruelty free and dermatologist tested. For optimal performance, warm a small amount of pomade between your hands. Apply first to the sides and then the back of your head. Work your way to the top and style as usual.



BRAND STORY
By Jack Black
